name: Looper Driver!
description:
Looper Driver!

You are a taxi driver who tired of being stuck in a loop for doing same things everyday.

One day your anger reaches to the limit. You decide to blowing other taxis up instead of transporting passengers. Launch rocket to them while enjoying the drifting!

Looper Driver is a car driving game which you are trying to blow other taxis up and make them not be able to earn money. Meanwhile enjoy the drifting!

Credits:

Yigit Doruk - Developer, Game Designer
Semih Sevimli - Developer, Game Designer
Fatih Gorguc - Animation, Graphical Design, Level Design, UI/UX Design
Ezgi Kati - Composer, Sound Design
Mustafa Ahmet Ozdemir - Developer, UI/UX Design
